00187 // Fonction de calcul de cf(limiteur de pente) dans le schema Quick-sharp
00188 
00189 inline double sharp(const double& utc)
00190 {
00191   double cf;
00192   if ( (utc <= -1) || (utc >= 1.5) )
00193     cf = 0.125;
00194   else if ((utc > -1) && (utc <= 0) )
00195     cf = 0.5 + 0.375*utc;
00196   else if ((utc <= 0.25) && (utc > 0) )
00197     cf = 0.5 - 0.625*sqrt(utc);
00198   else if ((utc > 0.25) && (utc <= 1.) )
00199     cf = 0.25*(1.-utc);
00200   else
00201     cf = 0.25*(utc-1.);
00202   return cf;
00203 }
00204 
00205 inline double conv_quick_sharp_plus(const double& psc,const double& vit_0, const double& vit_1,
00206                                     const double& vit_0_0, const double& dx,
00207                                     const double& dm, const double& dxam)
00208 {
00209   double cf;
00210   double curv;
00211   double delta_0 = vit_0 - vit_0_0;
00212   double delta = vit_1 - vit_0;
00213   double dd1,utc;
00214   double delta_delta;
00215 
00216   curv = (delta/dx - delta_0/dxam)/dm ;
00217 
00218 // Calcul de cf:
00219 
00220   delta_delta = delta_0+delta;
00221   dd1 = dabs(delta_delta);
00222   if (dd1 < 1.e-5)
00223     cf = 0.125;
00224   else
00225     {
00226       utc = delta_0/delta_delta;
00227       cf = sharp(utc);
00228     }
00229 // Cerr << "cf " << cf << " dx " << dx << " dxam " << dxam << " dm " << dm << finl ;
00230   return (0.5*(vit_0 + vit_1) - cf*(dx*dx)*curv)*psc;
00231 
00232 }
00233 
00234 inline double conv_quick_sharp_moins(const double& psc,const double& vit_0,const double& vit_1,
00235                                      const double& vit_1_1,const double& dx,
00236                                      const double& dm,const double& dxam)
00237 {
00238   double cf;
00239   double curv;
00240   double delta_1 = vit_1_1 - vit_1;
00241   double delta = vit_1 - vit_0;
00242   double dd1,utc;
00243   double delta_delta;
00244 
00245   curv = ( delta_1/dxam - delta/dx )/dm ;
00246 
00247 // Calcul de cf:
00248 
00249   delta_delta = delta_1+delta;
00250   dd1 = dabs(delta_delta);
00251   if (dd1 < 1.e-5)
00252     cf = 0.125;
00253   else
00254     {
00255       utc = delta_1/delta_delta;
00256       cf = sharp(utc);
00257     }
00258 
00259   return (0.5*(vit_0 + vit_1) - cf*(dx*dx)*curv)*psc;
00260 
00261 }
00262 
00263 inline double Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::dim_elem(int n1, int k) const
00264 {
00265   const IntTab& elem_faces_ = la_zone->elem_faces();
00266 
00267   return dist_face(elem_faces_(n1,k), elem_faces_(n1,k+dimension), k) ;
00268 
00269 // return la_zone->dim_elem_axi(n1,k);
00270 }
00271 
00272 
00273 inline double Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::dist_elem(int n1, int n2, int k) const
00274 {
00275   const DoubleTab& xp_ = la_zone->xp();
00276   double d_teta, dist ;
00277 
00278   if (k != 1)
00279     dist = xp_(n2,k)-xp_(n1,k) ;
00280   else
00281     {
00282       d_teta = xp_(n2,1) - xp_(n1,1);
00283       if (d_teta < 0)
00284         d_teta += 2.0*M_PI;
00285       dist = d_teta * xp_(n1,0);
00286     }
00287 
00288   return dist ;
00289 
00290 // return la_zone->dist_elem_axi(n1,n2,k);
00291 }
00292 
00293 inline double Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::dist_face(int n1, int n2, int k) const
00294 {
00295   double d_teta , dist ;
00296   const DoubleTab& xv_ = la_zone->xv();
00297 
00298   if (k != 1)
00299     dist =  xv_(n2,k) - xv_(n1,k);
00300   else
00301     {
00302       d_teta = xv_(n2,1) - xv_(n1,1);
00303       if (d_teta < 0)
00304         d_teta += 2.0*M_PI;
00305       if (d_teta > M_PI)
00306         d_teta -= M_PI ;
00307       dist = d_teta*xv_(n1,0);
00308     }
00309 // Cerr << " dteta " << d_teta << " xv " << xv_(n1,1) << " k " << k << "dist " << dist << finl ;
00310   return dist ;
00311 // return la_zone->dist_face_axi(n1,n2,k);
00312 }
00313 
00314 inline double Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::dim_face(int n1, int k) const
00315 {
00316   const IntTab& face_voisins_ = la_zone->face_voisins();
00317   int elem0, elem1 ;
00318 
00319   elem0 = face_voisins_(n1,0) ;
00320   elem1 = face_voisins_(n1,1) ;
00321   if (elem0 < 0 )
00322     return  dim_elem(elem1, k) ;
00323   if (elem1 < 0 )
00324     return  dim_elem(elem0, k) ;
00325 
00326   return (dim_elem(elem0, k) + dim_elem(elem1, k)) * 0.5 ;
00327 
00328 // return la_zone->dim_face_axi(n1,k);
00329 }
00330 
00331 inline int Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::face_amont_conj(int num_face, int k, int i) const
00332 {
00333   const IntTab& face_voisins_ = la_zone->face_voisins();
00334   const IntTab& elem_faces_   = la_zone->elem_faces();
00335   const IntVect& orientation_ = la_zone->orientation();
00336 
00337   int ori = orientation_(num_face);
00338   int elem1 = face_voisins_(num_face,1);
00339   int face,elem_bis = -2;
00340   int face_conj = -1 ;
00341 
00342   if(elem1 != -1)
00343     {
00344       face = elem_faces_(elem1, k+i*dimension);
00345       elem_bis = face_voisins_(face,i);
00346       if (elem_bis != -1)
00347         face_conj = elem_faces_(elem_bis, ori);
00348       else
00349         face_conj = -1;
00350     }
00351   if ((elem1==-1) || (elem_bis==-1))
00352     {
00353       elem1 = face_voisins_(num_face,0);
00354       if(elem1 != -1)
00355         {
00356           face = elem_faces_(elem1, k+i*dimension);
00357           elem_bis = face_voisins_(face,i);
00358           assert(elem_bis!=-2);
00359           if (elem_bis != -1)
00360             face_conj = elem_faces_(elem_bis, ori);
00361           else
00362             face_conj = -1;
00363         }
00364     }
00365 
00366   return face_conj;
00367 
00368 // return la_zone->face_amont_conj(num_face, k, i);
00369 }
00370 
00371 inline int Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::face_amont_princ(int num_face, int i) const
00372 {
00373 // const IntTab& face_voisins_ = la_zone->face_voisins();
00374 // const IntTab& elem_faces_   = la_zone->elem_faces();
00375 // const IntVect& orientation_ = la_zone->orientation();
00376 
00377 // int ori=orientation_(num_face);
00378 // int elem=face_voisins_(num_face,i);
00379 
00380 // if(elem !=-1)
00381 // elem=elem_faces_(elem,ori+i*dimension);
00382 // return elem;
00383 
00384   return la_zone->face_amont_princ(num_face, i);
00385 }
00386 
00387 // Fonctions de calcul des flux pour une inconnue scalaire
00388 
00389 ////!< flux_arete_fluide 
00390 //
00391 
00392 inline void Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_arete_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,
00393                                                        int fac1, int fac2,
00394                                                        int fac3, int signe,
00395                                                        double& flux3,double& flux1_2) const
00396 {
00397   double flux,psc;
00398   int ori;
00399   psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00400                  dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00401                 (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00402 
00403   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00404     flux=inco[fac3]*psc ;
00405   else
00406     {
00407       ori =orientation(fac3);
00408       flux = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),fac1,ori,la_zcl)
00409                   +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),fac2,ori,la_zcl)) * psc ;
00410     }
00411   flux3 = -flux;
00412 
00413 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00414 
00415   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00416   if (psc>0)
00417     flux = psc*inco[fac1];
00418   else
00419     flux = psc*inco[fac2];
00420 
00421   flux1_2 = -flux;
00422 }
00423 
00424 
00425 ////!< flux_arete_interne 
00426 //
00427 
00428 inline double Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_arete_interne(const DoubleTab& inco, int fac1,
00429                                                           int fac2, int fac3, int fac4) const
00430 {
00431   double flux;
00432   double psc = 0.25* (dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite(fac1) + dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite(fac2))
00433                * (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2));
00434   int ori = orientation(fac1);
00435   int num0_0 = face_amont_conj(fac3,ori,0);
00436   int num1_1 = face_amont_conj(fac4,ori,1);
00437 
00438   if (psc > 0)
00439     if (num0_0 == -1) //!< Schema amont
00440       flux = psc*inco[fac3];
00441     else //!< Schema quick
00442       {
00443         double dx = dist_face(fac3,fac4,ori);
00444         double dm = dim_face(fac3,ori);
00445         double dxam = dist_face(num0_0,fac3,ori);
00446         double vit_0 = inco[fac3];
00447         double vit_0_0 = inco[num0_0];
00448         double vit_1 = inco[fac4];
00449 // Cerr << "fac3 " << fac3 << "ori " << ori << " dx " << dx << " dxam " << dxam << " dm " << dm << finl ;
00450         flux = conv_quick_sharp_plus(psc,vit_0,vit_1,vit_0_0,dx,dm,dxam);
00451       }
00452 
00453   else //!< (psc <= 0)
00454     if (num1_1 == -1) //!< Schema amont
00455       flux = psc*inco[fac4];
00456     else //!< Schema quick
00457       {
00458         double dx = dist_face(fac3,fac4,ori);
00459         double dm = dim_face(fac4,ori);
00460         double dxam = dist_face(fac4,num1_1,ori);
00461         double vit_0 = inco[fac3];
00462         double vit_1 = inco[fac4];
00463         double vit_1_1 = inco[num1_1];
00464         flux = conv_quick_sharp_moins(psc,vit_0,vit_1,vit_1_1,dx,dm,dxam);
00465       }
00466   return -flux;
00467 }
00468 
00469 
00470 ////!< flux_arete_mixte 
00471 //
00472 
00473 inline double Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_arete_mixte(const DoubleTab& inco ,
00474                                                         int fac1, int fac2,
00475                                                         int fac3, int fac4) const
00476 {
00477   double flux;
00478   double psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1] +
00479                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00480                ( surface[fac1] + surface[fac2] );
00481   if (psc>0)
00482     flux = psc*inco[fac3];
00483   else
00484     flux = psc*inco[fac4];
00485 
00486   return -flux;
00487 }

00498 
00499 ////!< flux_arete_paroi_fluide 
00500 //
00501 
00502 inline void Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_arete_paroi_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,
00503                                                              int fac1, int fac2,
00504                                                              int fac3, int signe,
00505                                                              double& flux3, double& flux1_2) const
00506 {
00507   double flux,psc;
00508   int ori;
00509   psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00510                  dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00511                 (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00512 
00513   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00514     flux=inco[fac3]*psc ;
00515   else
00516     {
00517       ori =orientation(fac3);
00518       flux = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),fac1-premiere_face_bord, ori,la_zcl)
00519                   +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),fac2-premiere_face_bord, ori,la_zcl))* psc ;
00520     }
00521 
00522   flux3 = -flux;
00523 
00524 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00525 
00526   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00527   if (psc>0)
00528     flux = psc*inco[fac1];
00529   else
00530     flux = psc*inco[fac2];
00531 
00532   flux1_2 = -flux;
00533 }

00551 
00552 
00553 ////!< flux_fa7_elem 
00554 //
00555 
00556 inline double Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_fa7_elem(const DoubleTab& inco, int num_elem,
00557                                                      int fac1, int fac2) const
00558 {
00559   double flux;
00560   int num0_0 = face_amont_princ(fac1,0);
00561   int num1_1 = face_amont_princ(fac2,1);
00562   double psc = 0.25 * (dt_vitesse[fac1]+dt_vitesse[fac2])*(surface(fac1)+surface(fac2));
00563   if  (psc > 0)
00564     {
00565       if (num0_0 == -1) //!< Schema amont
00566         flux = psc*inco[fac1]*porosite(fac1);
00567       else
00568         {
00569           int ori = orientation(fac1);
00570           double dx = dim_elem(num_elem,ori);
00571           int elem_amont = elem_(fac1,0);
00572           double dm = dist_elem(elem_amont,num_elem,ori);
00573           double dxam = dim_elem(elem_amont,ori);
00574           double vit_0 = inco[fac1]*porosite(fac1);
00575           double vit_0_0 = inco[num0_0]*porosite(num0_0);
00576           double vit_1 = inco[fac2]*porosite(fac2);
00577 
00578           flux = conv_quick_sharp_plus(psc,vit_0,vit_1,vit_0_0,dx,dm,dxam);
00579         }
00580     }
00581   else //!< (psc < 0)
00582     {
00583       if (num1_1 == -1) //!< Schema amont
00584         flux = psc*inco[fac2]*porosite(fac2);
00585       else
00586         {
00587           int ori = orientation(fac2);
00588           double dx = dim_elem(num_elem,ori);
00589           int elem_amont = elem_(fac2,1);
00590           double dm = dist_elem(num_elem,elem_amont,ori);
00591           double dxam = dim_elem(elem_amont,ori);
00592           double vit_0 = inco[fac1]*porosite(fac1);
00593           double vit_1 = inco[fac2]*porosite(fac2);
00594           double vit_1_1 = inco[num1_1]*porosite(num1_1);
00595 
00596           flux = conv_quick_sharp_moins(psc,vit_0,vit_1,vit_1_1,dx,dm,dxam);
00597         }
00598     }
00599 
00600   return -flux;
00601 }
00602 
00603 
00604 inline double Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_fa7_sortie_libre(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00605                                                              const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
00606                                                              int num1) const
00607 {
00608   double flux;
00609   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face);
00610   int elem1 = elem_(face,0);
00611   if (elem1 != -1)
00612     if (psc > 0)
00613       flux = psc*inco[face];
00614     else
00615       flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,orientation(face));
00616   else //!< (elem2 != -1)
00617     if (psc < 0)
00618       flux = psc*inco[face];
00619     else
00620       flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,orientation(face));
00621 
00622   return -flux;
00623 }
00624 
00625 // Fonctions de calcul des flux pour une inconnue vectorielle
00626 
00627 ////!< flux_arete_fluide 
00628 //
00629 
00630 inline void Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_arete_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,int fac1,
00631                                                        int fac2,int fac3,int signe,
00632                                                        DoubleVect& flux3, DoubleVect& flux1_2) const
00633 {
00634   int k;
00635   double psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00636                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00637                        (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00638 
00639   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00640     for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00641       flux3(k) = -inco(fac3,k)*psc ;
00642   else
00643     {
00644       int ori = orientation(fac3);
00645       for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00646         flux3(k) = -0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),fac1,k,ori,la_zcl)
00647                          +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),fac2,k,ori,la_zcl)) * psc ;
00648     }
00649 
00650 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00651 
00652   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00653   if (psc>0)
00654     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00655       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac1,k);
00656   else
00657     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00658       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac2,k);
00659 
00660 }
00661 
00662 
00663 ////!< flux_arete_interne 
00664 //
00665 
00666 inline void Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_arete_interne(const DoubleTab& inco, int fac1,
00667                                                         int fac2, int fac3, int fac4,
00668                                                         DoubleVect& flux) const
00669 {
00670   int k;
00671   int ncomp = flux.size();
00672   double psc = 0.25* (dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite(fac1) + dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite(fac2))
00673                * (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2));
00674   int ori = orientation(fac1);
00675   int num0_0 = face_amont_conj(fac3,ori,0);
00676   int num1_1 = face_amont_conj(fac4,ori,1);
00677 
00678   if (psc > 0)
00679     if (num0_0 == -1) //!< Schema amont
00680       for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00681         flux(k) = -psc*inco(fac3,k);
00682     else //!< Schema quick
00683       {
00684         double dx = dist_face(fac3,fac4,ori);
00685         double dm = dim_face(fac3,ori);
00686         double dxam = dist_face(num0_0,fac3,ori);
00687         DoubleVect vit_0(ncomp);
00688         DoubleVect vit_0_0(ncomp);
00689         DoubleVect vit_1(ncomp);
00690         for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00691           {
00692             vit_0(k) = inco(fac3,k);
00693             vit_0_0(k) = inco(num0_0,k);
00694             vit_1(k) = inco(fac4,k);
00695             flux(k) = -conv_quick_sharp_plus(psc,vit_0(k),vit_1(k),vit_0_0(k),dx,dm,dxam);
00696           }
00697       }
00698 
00699   else //!< (psc <= 0)
00700     if (num1_1 == -1) //!< Schema amont
00701       for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00702         flux(k) = -psc*inco(fac4,k);
00703     else //!< Schema quick
00704       {
00705         double dx = dist_face(fac3,fac4,ori);
00706         double dm = dim_face(fac4,ori);
00707         double dxam = dist_face(fac4,num1_1,ori);
00708         DoubleVect vit_0(ncomp);
00709         DoubleVect vit_1(ncomp);
00710         DoubleVect vit_1_1(ncomp);
00711         for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00712           {
00713             vit_0(k) = inco(fac3,k);
00714             vit_1(k) = inco(fac4,k);
00715             vit_1_1(k) = inco(num1_1,k);
00716             flux(k) = -conv_quick_sharp_moins(psc,vit_0(k),vit_1(k),vit_1_1(k),dx,dm,dxam);
00717           }
00718       }
00719 }
00720

00722 ////!< flux_arete_mixte 
00723 //
00724 
00725 inline void Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_arete_mixte(const DoubleTab& inco,int fac1,
00726                                                       int fac2,int fac3, int fac4,
00727                                                       DoubleVect& flux) const
00728 {
00729   int k;
00730   double psc = 0.25 * ( dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1] +
00731                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00732                ( surface[fac1] + surface[fac2] );
00733   if (psc>0)
00734     for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00735       flux(k) = -psc*inco(fac3,k);
00736   else
00737     for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00738       flux(k) = -psc*inco(fac4,k);
00739 }

00752 ////!< flux_arete_paroi_fluide 
00753 //
00754 
00755 inline void Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_arete_paroi_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco,int fac1,
00756                                                              int fac2,int fac3,int signe,
00757                                                              DoubleVect& flux3, DoubleVect& flux1_2) const
00758 {
00759   int k;
00760   double psc = 0.25 * ((dt_vitesse[fac1]*porosite[fac1]    +
00761                         dt_vitesse[fac2]*porosite[fac2] )  *
00762                        (surface(fac1) + surface(fac2))  );
00763 
00764   if ((psc*signe)>0)
00765     for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00766       flux3(k) = -inco(fac3,k)*psc;
00767   else
00768     {
00769       int ori = orientation(fac3);
00770       for (k=0; k<flux3.size(); k++)
00771         flux3(k) = -0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),fac1-premiere_face_bord,k,ori,la_zcl)
00772                          +  Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),fac2-premiere_face_bord,k,ori,la_zcl))* psc ;
00773     }
00774 
00775 // Calcul de flux1_2:
00776 
00777   psc = 0.5*dt_vitesse(fac3)*surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00778   if (psc>0)
00779     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00780       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac1,k);
00781   else
00782     for (k=0; k<flux1_2.size(); k++)
00783       flux1_2(k) = -psc*inco(fac2,k);
00784 
00785 }

00805 
00806 ////!< flux_fa7_elem 
00807 //
00808 
00809 inline void Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_fa7_elem(const DoubleTab& inco,int num_elem,
00810                                                    int fac1,int fac2,DoubleVect& flux) const
00811 {
00812   int k;
00813   int num0_0 = face_amont_princ(fac1,0);
00814   int num1_1 = face_amont_princ(fac2,1);
00815   int ncomp = flux.size();
00816   double psc = 0.25 * (dt_vitesse[fac1]+dt_vitesse[fac2])*(surface(fac1)+surface(fac2));
00817   if  (psc > 0)
00818     {
00819       if (num0_0 == -1) //!< Schema amont
00820         for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00821           flux(k) = -psc*inco(fac1,k)*porosite(fac1);
00822       else
00823         {
00824           int ori = orientation(fac1);
00825           double dx = dim_elem(num_elem,ori);
00826           int elem_amont = elem_(fac1,0);
00827           double dm = dist_elem(elem_amont,num_elem,ori);
00828           double dxam = dim_elem(elem_amont,ori);
00829           DoubleVect vit_0(ncomp);
00830           DoubleVect vit_0_0(ncomp);
00831           DoubleVect vit_1(ncomp);
00832           for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00833             {
00834               vit_0(k) = inco(fac1,k)*porosite(fac1);
00835               vit_0_0(k) = inco(num0_0,k)*porosite(num0_0);
00836               vit_1(k) = inco(fac2,k)*porosite(fac2);
00837               flux(k) = -conv_quick_sharp_plus(psc,vit_0(k),vit_1(k),vit_0_0(k),dx,dm,dxam);
00838             }
00839         }
00840     }
00841   else //!< (psc < 0)
00842     {
00843       if (num1_1 == -1) //!< Schema amont
00844         for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00845           flux(k) = -psc*inco(fac2,k)*porosite(fac2);
00846       else
00847         {
00848           int ori = orientation(fac2);
00849           double dx = dim_elem(num_elem,ori);
00850           int elem_amont = elem_(fac2,1);
00851           double dm = dist_elem(num_elem,elem_amont,ori);
00852           double dxam = dim_elem(elem_amont,ori);
00853           DoubleVect vit_0(ncomp);
00854           DoubleVect vit_1(ncomp);
00855           DoubleVect vit_1_1(ncomp);
00856           for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00857             {
00858               vit_0(k) = inco(fac1,k)*porosite(fac1);
00859               vit_1(k) = inco(fac2,k)*porosite(fac2);
00860               vit_1_1(k) = inco(num1_1,k)*porosite(num1_1);
00861               flux(k) = -conv_quick_sharp_moins(psc,vit_0(k),vit_1(k),vit_1_1(k),dx,dm,dxam);
00862             }
00863         }
00864     }
00865 }
00866 
00867 
00868 inline void Eval_Quick_VDF_Face_Axi::flux_fa7_sortie_libre(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00869                                                            const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
00870                                                            int num1,DoubleVect& flux) const
00871 {
00872   int k;
00873   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face);
00874   int elem1 = elem_(face,0);
00875   if (elem1 != -1)
00876     if (psc > 0)
00877       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00878         flux(k) = -psc*inco(face,k);
00879     else
00880       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00881         flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
00882   else //!< (elem2 != -1)
00883     if (psc < 0)
00884       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00885         flux(k) = -psc*inco(face,k);
00886     else
00887       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00888         flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
00889 }
